description: Define acceptance criteria (When/Then) for stories to establish clear success criteria
goal: Explore each story to create testable acceptance criteria
inputs: story-graph.json with discovery details, domain models, user flows
outputs: story-graph.json (with acceptance criteria), individual story files with AC
instructions: Perform each instruction action as specified in base_actions, tweaked for the exploration behavior.
**NOTE: Action order and action-specific instructions are determined by the actions_workflow section below. Always check that section for the correct sequence and instructions.**
- **STOP for human feedback** when told to stop or when action requires user input
- **CONTINUE to next action** when told to proceed
- **STOP when complete** when all actions are finished

actions.name: build_knowledge
instructions: Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/3_build_knowledge/instructions.json, agile_bot/bots/story_bot/behaviors/5_exploration/2_content/1_knowledge_graph/instructions.json, exploration: build acceptance criteria AND refine domain model based on acceptance criteria details
Refine domain model concepts, relationships, and responsibilities based on acceptance criteria exploration
CRITICAL: Update the EXISTING story-graph.json file (do NOT create story-graph-explored.json or any separate file)
CRITICAL: Add/update Steps and acceptance_criteria ONLY in main epics section (single source of truth), NOT in increments section

actions.name: validate_rules
instructions: Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/4_validate_rules/instructions.json, exploration: validate AC format and coverage AND domain model refinements

actions.name: render_output
instructions: Follow agile_bot/bots/base_bot/base_actions/5_render_output/instructions.json, exploration: render feature documents with AC

trigger_words.description: Behavior-level trigger words - specific to exploration/acceptance criteria behavior
